Innovador en muchos aspectos. Uno de ellos seria el entorno que varia constantemente, a diferencia de de la primera entrega que permanecíamos casi todo el tiempo encerrados en el laboratorio, pero en este juego eso cambia pasando por todo tipo de sitios y usando vehículos  libremente. Compaginando bien con el motor de físicas que da el Source, de las que requeriremos bastante a la hora de jugar. El argumento Half-Life 2 lo sabe llevar de forma excelente, debido a que no te cuentan los hechos directamente de por ejemplo quienes son los combines o que es la guerra de las 7 horas. Si no que opta por permitirle al jugador de observar todo libremente mediante los Scripts en tiempo real, y esto se va a otros aspectos como al ambiente con grafitis de la resistencia y los diálogos del reparto de personajes. Sin duda una de las mejores experiencias mas inmersivas que se puede tener con un videojuego.

Reviewing games I played a long time ago:

Probably my 2nd favourite game ever after the original Half-Life. It aged gracefully for a 15 year old game and it still plays more or less like a modern shooter, thats a testament of how groundbreaking it was in 2004.
One of my favorite games of al time. Old game but a awesome game.

This is one of, if not, the best games I've ever played. The level design, story, puzzles, gameplay, and pretty much everything are perfect. If you've never played it, please do. This is really one of those games that NEEDS to be experienced. Mind you, this game came out in 2004 and it has better story and gameplay than most shooters today.
 
Overall: 10/10, It's just perfect.
A classic yet amazing game. Very exiting.

Yes. I play pirated Half Life 2 before. I know I'm such a monster like one leg pirate take wooden boat and get some Russian Navy big boolets without asking how hanging fellow pirate.

When I enter to the world of Steam I buy this game  and buy other game like this for collecting episode. This game is good enough but mod are difficult to install. I give up and don't play this game.

Until this year I finally figure out how to install mod. This game is back to really fun again.

Stop play pirated Half Life 2 and buy this game.

No game is perfect, but I can see the huge amount of influence Half Life: 2 had on Valve's own games (I know from my near 2k hours of TF2), as well as the rest of the industry. The enemy AI was clearly ahead of its time and they are still challenging today. The weapons feel exactly how they would feel in any other good source engine game, and it has a pretty chilling story with an incredible soundtrack.
I look forward to playing Half Life: Alyx

Jogo Excelente!!! Não é por acaso que ganhou vários prémios de "Jogo do Ano", para além de dinâmico e divertido, este jogo possui, também, uma história bem estruturada e personagens interessantes. Nele assumem o controlo de Gordon Freeman, um cientista de 27 anos que veio libertar a Cidade 17 da poderosa força Combine, tendo que ultrapassar várias armadilhas, obstáculos e inimigos até atingir os seus objetivos.
Em suma, este é um jogo que não pode faltar na biblioteca de nenhum gamer, pelo que o recomendo totalmente!

Um dos únicos FPS que eu não consigo jogar.

Después de 40 horas y conseguir todos los logros puedo decir que lo recomiendo al (3)00% (Valve cabrones xd). Es de esos juegos que tienes que pasar al menos una vez en tu vida. La historia supera ampliamente al primero, y eso ya es decir mucho. Algo a destacar es la banda sonora y las físicas del juego, los niveles están muy bien logrados y en ningún momento se vuelve aburrido.

Esté en oferta o no, cómpralo! No tiene pérdida, vale cada centavo y Freeman es un tipazo ♡

I like this game. Even in 2020. The only downside is it was a short game for me.

I finally beat the game! Sorry I was a little late to the party. I loved the original HL in 99 and have started up HL2 multiple times over the years on older, wimpy PCs and even the Xbox 360. Stopped for one reason or another (usually once I got to the boat levels) but 2020 was the year to beat this apparently.  The late levels were really alot of fun. You know how some games just kinda duplicate levels near the end? Not HL2. Your gravity gun gets even better and the set pieces really get going.

A few glitches with the HUD popped up about half-way through but I figured things out. I wish they had a 'behind the tech" mode like in Portal and TF2, but I'll live. On to the episodes (which I also have kinda played but never finished)!
I'd say this is the best version of Half-Life 2. If you've only played the XBOX version, It is a definite yes to buy this version. I'd suggest after buying this and the episodes, get MMOD for it.
